benchmark_details.name: TEXT2WORLD
benchmark_details.overview: TEXT2WORLD is a novel benchmark based on Planning Domain Definition Language (PDDL), featuring hundreds of diverse domains for evaluating the symbolic world modeling capabilities of large language models (LLMs). It employs multi-criteria, execution-based metrics for robust evaluation.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive evaluation framework for symbolic world modeling capabilities of LLMs.

data.source: A collection of 1,801 raw PDDL files from public repositories and planning competitions, filtered to 264 high-quality PDDL domain specifications.
data.annotation: Manually annotated natural language descriptions by recruited computer science graduates.

methodology.calculation: Based on parsing generated PDDL and comparing it to ground truth PDDL.
methodology.interpretation: Higher values in metrics indicate better performance in world modeling.
methodology.baseline_results: The best-performing LLM, DeepSeek-R1, achieves F1 scores below 60% for both preconditions and effects without error correction.
methodology.validation: Multiple validation stages to ensure accuracy and quality of annotations.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.compliance_with_regulations: Adheres to ethical guidelines for data collection.
